headline: Launching World’s First Commercial Subsea Desalination Plant, Flocean adds Xylem as Strategic Investor and Extends Series A Funding
summary: OSLO, Norway, November 18, 2025--Flocean, the Norwegian subsea desalination company recently named as a TIME Best Invention of 2025, today announced it has extended its total Series A funding to $22.5M (NOK 228 million).
